title: Apple shares rise as quarterly earnings beat expectations
text: Apple reported revenue growth and beat Wall Street estimates for earnings per share in its fiscal Q3.

title: Tesla stock falls after production misses forecast
text: Production bottlenecks weighed on deliveries; analysts trimmed price targets.

title: Central bank signals rate cuts could come sooner than expected
text: Bond yields fell and growth-sensitive sectors rallied following the guidance.

title: Company XYZ faces SEC probe over accounting practices
text: Shares plunged intraday amid concerns about financial reporting controls.

title: Q2 EPS updates: mixed outlook for semiconductors
text: YoY softness persists, but management sees sequential QoQ improvement.
